name: Dziewanna Verbascum
description:
A relaxing, 3d game about a witch. She is little messy and nuts but happy. She looks for ingredients... very important ingredients for the legendary potion - "The Cure" to found herself.

Programming: Łukasz Sawicki

Music and sound: Alexey Vorsoba

Art direction: Kinga Antonina

Additional art: Małgorzata Słoniewska
